author: Linda Estrada
text: I am currently reviewing and upgrading my Department's Business Continuity Plan.  Internal Services Department provides Computer/Data, Purchasing, Building Maintenance, and Support Services such as Mail/Messenger, Automotive Fleet and printing services to departments in Los Angeles County.  Although we are not a "First Responder" during an emergency/disaster - we are a Lead Department. We will need to stay in business to assist the "First Responder" departments.  I would like to review "Business Continuity Plans" in other government agencies who provide services similar to ISD.
title: Business Continuity Plan
